Evils Kingdom

悪(あく)ノ(ノ)王(おう)国(こく)aku NO oukoku

QWCE-10031

"Welcome, to 'the forest theater'."

mothy's fifth album featuring a collection of fifteen new and remastered songs arranged in chronological order released on December 22, 2010. The album is licensed through EXIT TUNES and is available on Apple Music Japan and Amazon.

Website · Playlist · Booklet

Tracklist

  1. moonlit bear
  2. Tale of Abandonment on a Moonlit Night
  3. Chrono Story
  4. The Lunacy of Duke Venomania
  5. Evil Food Eater Conchita
  6. Twiright Prank
  7. The Daughter of Evil
  8. The Servant of Evil
  9. Regret Message
  10. The Daughter of White
  11. Re_birthday
  12. The Tailor of Enbizaka
  13. Judgment of Corruption
  14. Miniature Garden Girl
  15. Heartbeat Clocktower

Notes

  • The album cover was illustrated by Ichika; the booklet features art by Suzunosuke, Ichika, and Rgveta.
  • Initial purchases of the album included The Song that Resounds with Lulila, Lulila as a sixteenth bonus track; its lyrics are featured on the back of the booklet.
  • The booklet contains no lyrics; they were instead printed on a seperate sheet.
  • The page for each song in the album listed a short phrase alongside commentary from "Ma".
  • The end of the booklet features a timeline spanning from the year 001 to 999, with the description for 999 burnt off.
  • The album came with many interactive elements that revealed various secrets—"Ma" introduces a word game on the page for Heartbeat Clocktower that when completed reveals her true identity as "Magician"; aligning punched illustrations over the CD reveals the words "crescent", "mirror", and "twilight" or "Blackbox" and "Solitude"; and aligning a punched illustration over the back of the booklet spells out "たいざいのうつわtaizai no utsuwa" ("vessels of deadly sin").
